[00:00.23]Stay (Explicit) - The Kid LAROI/Justin Bieber
[00:01.54]Lyrics by：Justin Bieber/Charlton Howard/Omer Fedi/Blake Slatkin/Charlie Puth/Magnus Høiberg

[00:11.43]I do the same thing I told you that I never would
[00:14.12]I told you I'd change even when I knew I never could
[00:17.13]I know that I can't find nobody else as good as you
[00:19.72]I need you to stay need you to stay hey
[00:22.44]Oh
[00:22.85]I get drunk wake up I'm wasted still
[00:25.72]I realize the time that I wasted here
[00:28.36]
[00:28.88]I feel like you can't feel the way I feel

[01:07.69]Justin Bieber：
[01:08.41]When I'm away from you I miss your touch
[01:10.52]Ooh
[01:11.14]You're the reason I believe in love
[01:13.37]Ooh
[01:13.97]It's been difficult for me to trust
[01:16.17]Ooh
[01:16.82]And I'm afraid that I'ma f**k it up
[01:18.93]Ooh
[01:19.65]Ain't no way that I can leave you stranded
[01:22.33]'Cause you ain't ever left me empty-handed
[01:25.14]And you know that I know that I can't live without you
[01:28.77]So baby stay

[01:30.75]Oh ooh-woah

data.trans:
[ti:STAY (Explicit)]
[ar:The Kid LAROI/Justin Bieber]
[al:STAY (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.23]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.54]//
[00:04.40]//
[00:07.91]//
[00:11.43]我向你许诺永不会做的事 都背着你做了
[00:14.12]我答应你会改过自新 即使我心里清楚自己不会照做
[00:17.13]我知道我再找不到像你这么好的爱人
[00:19.72]我需要你留下 需要你留在我身边
[00:22.44]//
[00:22.85]我喝得烂醉 睡了一觉 依然没有清醒
[00:25.72]我意识到这样浑浑噩噩浪费了自己多少时间
[00:28.36]
[00:28.88]我感觉到你无法与我感同身受
[00:31.45]如果你不在我身边 我会变得一团糟
[00:34.29]//
[00:35.84]//
[00:37.42]//
[00:38.89]//
[00:40.11]//

[00:48.30]我答应你会改过自新 即使我心里清楚自己不会照做
[00:51.07]我知道我再找不到像你这么好的爱人

[01:08.41]分别之时 你的爱抚令我魂牵梦萦
[01:10.52]//
[01:11.14]你的存在让我对爱树立起信仰
[01:13.37]//
[01:13.97]我很难鼓起勇气托付信任
[01:16.17]//
[01:16.82]害怕自己会搞砸所有
[01:18.93]//
[01:19.65]无论如何我都不能让你身陷桎梏
[01:22.33]因为你从不曾让我两手空空
[01:25.14]你知道我心里清楚 离开你我难以独活
[01:28.77]所以 宝贝 留下吧
[01:29.88]//
[01:30.75]//
